text:
Cisco Secure Access
is our leading security
service edge solution.

We are able to bring Cisco
secure access as well

as our Umbrella GovCloud
solutions to market

to meet stringent requirements
that are set forth
by the U.S. Government's Federal Risk
and Authorization Management program.
AWS played a very critical role in helping

and ensuring that Cisco
would meet our FedRAMP
certifications for Umbrella Gov.
We had a very aggressive goal in order

to take a very sophisticated
ecosystem of services
and bring that into the GovCloud,
and to do that within less than 12 months.

And the collaboration
with AWS allowed us to do
that while simultaneously meeting all

of those strict security
assessment requirements
of the FedRAMP program.

With the AWS security
services teams, we were able
to accelerate our development times

by leveraging their
assessments, as well as working
with AWS security professionals

to set up the hosted
GovCloud environments.

We've extensively leveraged
the AWS Skill Builder
and training courses in order
to make investments in our own teams
to more rapidly upskill them

and to develop their
expertise in building on
AWS infrastructure.

We were able to make tremendous
progress much more quickly

than we had expected with
a much better outcome
by collaborating with AWS.
